## ServiceError.isHttpError() method

Allows to distinguish transport errors (HTTP) from [service faults](./services.servicefault.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isHttpError(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

`true` if the error was a transport error (HTTP), `false` if it was a [service fault](./services.servicefault.md)<!-- -->.
